events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer requests a refund and return due to sizing issues, categorizing this case under Refund.
The case has been assigned to customer service agent Lisa to handle the refund process.
Hello! I’m Lisa from customer support. I’m here to help you with returning your jacket and processing your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is completely new; I haven’t worn or washed it.
Thanks for the details. You can send the jacket back for a full refund. We will provide a prepaid shipping label shortly.
Great, I appreciate your help! Please send me the label so I can return it this week.
The prepaid shipping label has been emailed to you. We will process your refund upon receipt of the jacket.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the shipping label and were able to send back your jacket.
Yes, I mailed the jacket yesterday using the label. Thank you for the smooth process.
We have received your jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account shortly.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to fill out a short survey about your refund experience.
I found the service very helpful and efficient. Thanks again for resolving my issue quickly.
The case has been officially closed following successful refund processing and customer feedback.
